word:
Letter 152, 1894, p. 2. (To W. C. White, September 20, 1894.)-- Sunday afternoon we rode to Prospect and Brother McCullagh said the church all wanted me to give the discourse, so I complied with their request. I send it with this letter. Fannie took it in longhand and got nearly the whole of it. She rode up with Brother and Sister Belden and your mother. 
                                                                           38
